title: SokoGenerator
description: SokoGenerator is a free, open source level generator for the game 'Sokoban'.
aboutProject:
SokoGenerator is a free, Open-Source level generator for the game Sokoban which was developed as part of my Honours Project that involved research into how to algorithmically class the difficulty of a Sokoban level.

The program will generate a number of levels based upon a set of variables that can be chosen by the user, and also contains a Sokoban Solver so that each level is guaranteed to be solvable.

The level generating and solving algorithms are written in C++, with the Qt framework providing the UI, and is compatable with Windows 7/8/10. Any generated levels can be saved to a .sok file which can be read by most Sokoban applications.
